text: I Can't Stand It may refer to: * "I Can't Stand It" (song), a song by Eric Clapton * "I Can't Stand It!", a song by Twenty 4 Seven * "I Can't Stand It", a song by The Spencer Davis Group from Their First LP * "I Can't Stand It", a song by The Velvet Underground from VU == See also == * "I Can't Stand Myself (When You Touch Me)", song by James Brown
title: I Can't Stand It
